courses.title: HTML/CSS
courses.description: The foundation of web development. Learn how to structure and style your web applications.

courses.title: JavaScript
courses.description: The scripting language that powers web applications. Learn how to create dynamic and interactive features.

courses.title: Mongo DB
courses.description: A NoSQL database perfect for storing flexible, document-oriented data. Ideal for modern web applications.

courses.title: Node.js
courses.description: JavaScript runtime environment that allows you to run JavaScript code outside of the browser. Build scalable and efficient web servers.

courses.title: Express.js
courses.description: A popular web framework built on top of Node.js. Simplify the process of creating web applications and APIs.

courses.title: React
courses.description: A powerful JavaScript library for building user interfaces. Create dynamic and interactive web experiences.

courses.title: React Redux
courses.description: A state management library for React applications. Manage application state effectively across components.

courses.title: React Query
courses.description: A library for managing data fetching and caching in React applications. Simplify data fetching logic and improve performance.

courses.title: Next.js
courses.description: A React framework for building server-rendered and statically generated web applications. Improve performance and SEO.

courses.title: TypeScript
courses.description: A superset of JavaScript that adds optional static typing. Improve code maintainability and catch errors early.
